document.full_text: dallas, the oldest team in the n.b.a. playoffs, got a game-high 48 points from dirk nowitzki to overshadow a 40-point performance by the thunder's kevin durant.
document.title: playoffs | mavericks 121, thunder 112: nowitzki scores 48 as mavericks show experience, not their age
lines_and_colors: dallas, the oldest team in the n.b.a. playoffs, got a game-high 48 points from dirk nowitzki to overshadow a 40-point performance by the thunder's kevin durant.
